pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes plus socks, and protective eyewear. Mixers/loaders and applicators must wear a minimum of a NIOSH-approved particulate filtering facepiece respirator with any R or P filter, or a NIOSH-approved elastomeric particulate respirator with any R or P filter, or a NIOSH-approved powered air-purifying respirator with an HE filter.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes then continue rinsing eye; Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-800-832-HELP (4357) for emergency medical treatment information.
